Title: Halter V-Neck Evening Dress with Side Cut Out

----

Sku: CR743

----

Price: 

----

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 8, 6, 10, 4

Colors: white

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: CR743-white-halter-v-neck-evening-dress-with-side-cut-out_p.jpg

----

Description: Form fitting gown that trails to the floor with a sweeping train. The V-neck forms a halter neck with two sparkling straps on the back. The waistline of the back is beaded with rhinestones and cuts to a V-shape. The front of the gown features two side peek-a-boos with the same beaded detail as the back of the gown.
